name: Fly Me Out
description:
The creation of the game name was inspired by a conversation with a friend of us who had experience the pain of bulimia, and whose personal experience strengthened our determination to help people with bulimia. 

In the subsequent in-depth interviews with the patient group, we learned that it was often difficult for them to talk about their illness in front of their relatives and friends, or they might face the dilemma of stating their current situation but not being understood. 

For most people, bulimia is often just a small problem that can be solved by "eating less". So we came up with the idea to make a game about bulimia, hoping that through this game, we could educate more people about bulimia, understand their struggle with both body and mental state health.
